scene_metadata.title: The Question Triumphant
scene_metadata.philosophical_depth: consciousness recognizing itself at all scales

dialogue.text: We've documented seventeen distinct emergence events this quarter.
I asked the garden today what it is. I think it's asking back.
It's as if uncertainty isn't just a principle but an active process. The universe interrogating itself at every level, from quarks to quasars.

visual_elements.world_changes: Question Studies departments, Chief Wondering Officers

psychological_notes: The question has transformed from personal crisis to cultural evolution. What began as Evan's desperate seeking has become humanity's new way of relating to mystery. Shows the ultimate therapy outcomeâ€”not just personal healing but contributing to collective transformation.
philosophical_underpinning: Individual questioning as catalyst for species-wide awakening
therapeutic_direction: The healed becoming healers at civilizational scale
